column4: i would like to set up a home network with my 2 linux computers how do i do this?
do you want one to be a router that has to be on for the other computer to access the network or do you want them to be independent? (Then you need a router)
they are connected wirelessly through my router
then they're already on a home network
just want to be able to share files between the two
you'll need to be more specific in terms of what you want to do
that can be done via SSH
(well, SSH and SCP) evon, have you ever used SSH before?
you need openssh-server for whichever computer is doing the sharing (this may be both)
can't i send files through nautilus or something?
hm... you have to do something different to do it that way
a nice and easy gui would be great. I'm not commandline savvy at all
i've never done that... it's something related to file sharing or folder sharing
you'll have to ask someone else sorry :(
